Storyline

Lara Brennan is arrested for murdering her boss with whom she had 
an argument. It seems she was seen leaving the scene of the crime 
and her fingerprints were on the murder weapon. Her husband, John 
would spend the next few years trying to get her released, but 
there's no evidence that negates the evidence against her. And when 
the strain of being separated from her family, especially her son,
gets to her, John decides to break her out. So he does a lot of
research to find a way.
